duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing Armed Access Control Points to several US military assets while at berth.
Monitoring access control computer screens for people coming and going from vessels and gates.
Communicating well via phone, radio, and written reports.
Being in the elements for long periods at times.
Working with others in close proximity throughout the day.

education_certification.credential: At least 1 year experience as an WA DOL Licensed Security Officer
